title: minerjones
author: minerjones
content: STARTING BID: 0.0001BTCMINIMUM BID INCREMENT: 0.0001BTC**Please limit bids to ONLY 4 decimal places**END TIME: NOVEMBER 6th, 2022, 12:00:00 PDT**Payment due within 24 hours of auction end!!**SNIPE: Any bid made in last 5 minutes will extend the auction 5 minutes beyond the ending time.If within those 5 extended minutes, a new bid is made, 5 minutes will be added to the auction from the time of that bid.PAYMENT: Bitcoin BTC. A signed PGP message will be sent to winner with payment addressSHIPPING: Based on location and preference

comments.author: FFrankie
comments.body: Can we get more info on this? Come on MJ. Am I so far out of the loop I'm supposed to know all about this?

comments.author: Hookzup1
comments.body: What size is this and how hard would it be to have the Chevy emblems removed lol

comments.author: JanEmil
comments.body: Quote from: FFrankie on November 01, 2022, 05:48:38 PMCan we get more info on this? Come on MJ. Am I so far out of the loop I'm supposed to know all about this? Last season design https://twitter.com/ecrindy/status/1398689766460252168https://www.edcarpenterracing.comYou also need the toy BTC race car. Looks so nice.

comments.author: minerjones
comments.body: Quote from: FFrankie on November 01, 2022, 05:48:38 PMCan we get more info on this? Come on MJ. Am I so far out of the loop I'm supposed to know all about this? Yes, use any search site like google.com and type in "bitcoin racing suit"Quote from: Hookzup1 on November 01, 2022, 05:50:51 PMWhat size is this and how hard would it be to have the Chevy emblems removed lolNo size is marked. Winner can do what they want with the suit including removing any emblems they dislikeQuote from: MoparMiningLLC on November 01, 2022, 03:28:28 PM.005 BTCCurrent high bidSimilar suit can be seen here: https://www.raceimage.com/Ed-Carpenter-Racing-Rinus-VeeKay-BITCOIN-Race-Used-IndyCar-Pit-Crew-Suit-V2-6981-c48w40i30_p_17465.html
